title: Suns return to 'Madhouse on McDowell'
text:
Suns return to 'Madhouse on McDowell' The Phoenix Suns have returned to the 'Madhouse on McDowell' for a team scrimmage. Post to Facebook Suns return to 'Madhouse on McDowell' The Phoenix Suns have returned to the 'Madhouse on McDowell' for a team scrimmage.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1RnUqRv   Join the Conversation To   Suns return to 'Madhouse on McDowell' Matthew Johnson and Cameron Cox , 12 Sports 7:11 p.m. MST October 3, 2015 Suns fans & legends reminisce about the Madhouse on McDowell KPNX Phoenix Suns CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Phoenix Suns have returned to the 'Madhouse on McDowell' for a team scrimmage. 
Former players such as Mark West and Eddie Johnson joined former owner Jerry Colangelo signing autographs for fans at the old Arizona Veterans Memorial Coliseum Saturday night. 
The Suns played there from 1968 to 1992. 
Saturday is the first time in 23 years the Suns have played a game inside the "madhouse". Read or Share this story: http://12ne.ws/1RnUqRv TOP VIDEOS
